choose.when:
SELECT l.idKey ,(SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(imageUrl ORDER BY idKey SEPARATOR ',,,') FROM fp_look_image WHERE lookIdKey = l.idKey GROUP BY lookIdKey) AS image
FROM fp_look l JOIN fp_look_tag lt ON l.idKey = lt.lookIdKey WHERE lt.tagName LIKE CONCAT('%', '','%') ORDER BY l.createDate desc

mapper.select: SELECT r.idKey ,r.reportType ,r.reportDate ,r.targetId ,r.detail ,u.userId FROM fp_report r LEFT JOIN fp_user u ON u.idKey = r.userIdKey WHERE r.reportType=#{reportType} ORDER BY r.reportDate DESC
